dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 900 IH: Cancel the Sequester Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Conyers (for himself, Ms. Jackson Lee, Ms. Wilson of Florida, and Mr. Grayson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To eliminate the sequestration under section 251A of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cancel the Sequester Act of 2013.
Section 251A of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 is repealed.
